# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Special Instructions

None.

```julia
function wrap_string(input_str::AbstractString, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(input_str)
    lines = []
    line = ""
    
    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) > text_width
            push!(lines, line)
            line = word * " "
        else
            line = line * word * " "
        end
    end
    
    # append any remaining words
    if !isempty(strip(line))
        push!(lines, line)
    end
    
    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# example usage:
example_string = "This is a test string to check the wrap function functionality of the wrap_string function."
println(wrap_string(example_string))
```
